original_text: Today the Lord has accepted you to be his own special people. He already promised that he would do that. As his people, you must obey all his commands.
korean_text: 여호와께서도 네게 말씀하신 대로 오늘 너를 그의 보배로운 백성이 되게 하시고 그의 모든 명령을 지키라 확언하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Today the Lord has accepted you
to be his own special people
He already promised that he would do that
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 이미 그렇게 하실 것을 약속하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: you must obey all his commands
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그분의 모든 명령을 순종해야 합니다
